name: yuque
description: 用于芸樱绘境官方社区bot（基于koishi打造）的语雀交互/消息通知插件

scripts.prerelease: git checkout master && git merge develop
scripts.postrelease: git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish --registry=https://sakurarealm-npm.pkg.coding.net/sakurarealmbot/sakurabot-koishi/ && git checkout develop && git merge master && git push

author: ConstasJ <2020212726@qq.com>
